metadata.title: CVE-2022-20424 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue. Notes: none.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-20424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-48-generic - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-5.15.0-48-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-48-generic - 5.15.0-48.54
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-48-generic-64k - 5.15.0-48.54
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-48.54').
